A simple notepad where you can easily record a note or save a photo.
Features:\n * Best notes full free application\n * Offline notepad where you can easily write thoughts without using the internet.\n * Notepad with protection. You can protect your notes with a password.\n * Adjust the color of your text for notes or entries in the diary.\n * Share your notes with other applications. * Check spelling in all your notes. * An unincorporated notepad. * Easy application that loads instantly. * Free diary and notepad for smartphones on android. Other Select note color
